title: Project Management I
description: This course will offer construction planning and management techniques for project design and construction with a focus on different scheduling methods and their use.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: BC 2631 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and BC 2632 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and BC 2634 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
